Title: Prototype pollution in jsii.configureCategories
Description:
`jsii` is a TypeScript to JavaScript compiler that also extracts an interface definition manifest to generate RPC stubs in various programming languages. jsii is typically used as a command-line tool, but it can also be loaded as a library.
When loaded as a library into a larger application, prototype pollution may happen if untrusted user input is passed to the library. When used as a command line-tool, this pollution cannot occur.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 5.4.0 before 5.4.46, all versions starting from 5.5.0 before 5.5.15, all versions starting from 5.6.0 before 5.6.4, all versions starting from 5.7.0 before 5.7.3
NotImpacted: All versions before 5.4.0, all versions starting from 5.4.46 before 5.5.0, all versions starting from 5.5.15 before 5.6.0, all versions starting from 5.6.4 before 5.7.0, all versions starting from 5.7.3
